languages.text: Корабль, вернувшийся от Безбожных звезд, не привез их экспедиции ни кладов ксеносов, ни координат перспективных миров, ни иных сокровищ. Единственная их добыча — неведомая белковая слизь, пригодная в пищу и размножающаяся с феноменальной скоростью. Тот, кто выкупит удивительную субстанцию, сможет заселить ее в культивационные чаны и прокормить ею целые ульи.

A ship has returned from an expedition to the Godless Stars with no xenos treasure, no coordinates of promising worlds, nor anything else of great value. All they have brought back is a mysterious protein-based slime that is edible and replicates itself at a phenomenal rate. Whoever purchases this amazing substance will be able to grow it in cultivation vats to feed entire hives.
languages.original_text: Корабль, вернувшийся от Безбожных звезд, не привез их экспедиции ни кладов ксеносов, ни координат перспективных миров, ни иных сокровищ. Единственная их добыча — неведомая белковая слизь, пригодная в пищу и размножающаяся с феноменальной скоростью. Тот, кто выкупит удивительную субстанцию, сможет заселить ее в культивационные чаны и прокормить ею целые ульи.

traits.locale_text: A ship has returned from an expedition to the Godless Stars with no xenos treasure, no coordinates of promising worlds, nor anything else of great value. All they have brought back is a mysterious protein-based slime that is edible and replicates itself at a phenomenal rate. Whoever purchases this amazing substance will be able to grow it in cultivation vats to feed entire hives.

Whoever purchases this amazing substance will be able to grow it in cultivation vats to feed entire hives.

Whoever purchases this amazing substance will be able to grow it in cultivation vats to feed entire hives.

A ship has returned from an expedition to the Godless Stars with no xenos treasure, no coordinates of promising worlds, nor anything else of great value. All they have brought back is a mysterious protein-based slime that is edible and replicates itself at a phenomenal rate. languages.text: Una nave ha vuelto de una expedición a las Estrellas Paganas sin tesoros xenos, sin coordenadas de mundos prometedores y sin nada más de gran valor. Lo único que han traído es un cieno con base de proteínas que es comestible y se reproduce a una velocidad sorprendente. Quienquiera que compre esta sustancia podrá criarla en cubas de cultivo para alimentar a colmenas enteras.
languages.original_text: A ship has returned from an expedition to the Godless Stars with no xenos treasure, no coordinates of promising worlds, nor anything else of great value. All they have brought back is a mysterious protein-based slime that is edible and replicates itself at a phenomenal rate. Whoever purchases this amazing substance will be able to grow it in cultivation vats to feed entire hives.

traits.locale_text: Una nave ha vuelto de una expedición a las Estrellas Paganas sin tesoros xenos, sin coordenadas de mundos prometedores y sin nada más de gran valor. Lo único que han traído es un cieno con base de proteínas que es comestible y se reproduce a una velocidad sorprendente. Quienquiera que compre esta sustancia podrá criarla en cubas de cultivo para alimentar a colmenas enteras.

languages.text: Un vaisseau est revenu d'une expédition dans les Étoiles Athées sans trésor xénos, ni coordonnées d'un monde prometteur, ni même quoi que ce soit de particulièrement précieux. Tout ce qu'il a rapporté dans ses soutes, c'est une sorte de gelée protéinique qui a la double particularité d'être comestible et de se répliquer à une vitesse phénoménale. Quiconque se portera acquéreur de cette substance incroyable sera en mesure de la cultiver dans des cuves pour nourrir des ruches entières.
languages.original_text: A ship has returned from an expedition to the Godless Stars with no xenos treasure, no coordinates of promising worlds, nor anything else of great value. All they have brought back is a mysterious protein-based slime that is edible and replicates itself at a phenomenal rate. Whoever purchases this amazing substance will be able to grow it in cultivation vats to feed entire hives.

traits.locale_text: Un vaisseau est revenu d'une expédition dans les Étoiles Athées sans trésor xénos, ni coordonnées d'un monde prometteur, ni même quoi que ce soit de particulièrement précieux. Tout ce qu'il a rapporté dans ses soutes, c'est une sorte de gelée protéinique qui a la double particularité d'être comestible et de se répliquer à une vitesse phénoménale. Quiconque se portera acquéreur de cette substance incroyable sera en mesure de la cultiver dans des cuves pour nourrir des ruches entières.

languages.text: 一艘飞船从无神群星探险归来，没有带回异形的宝藏，没有带回新世界的坐标，也没有带回任何其他有价值的东西，只带回了某种神秘的蛋白质粘液。这种粘液可以食用，且繁殖速度惊人。任何买家都可以在培养槽中培育这种神奇的物质，为整个巢都提供食物。
languages.original_text: A ship has returned from an expedition to the Godless Stars with no xenos treasure, no coordinates of promising worlds, nor anything else of great value. All they have brought back is a mysterious protein-based slime that is edible and replicates itself at a phenomenal rate. Whoever purchases this amazing substance will be able to grow it in cultivation vats to feed entire hives.

traits.locale_text: 一艘飞船从无神群星探险归来，没有带回异形的宝藏，没有带回新世界的坐标，也没有带回任何其他有价值的东西，只带回了某种神秘的蛋白质粘液。这种粘液可以食用，且繁殖速度惊人。任何买家都可以在培养槽中培育这种神奇的物质，为整个巢都提供食物。

languages.text: ある船が神なき星への探検から、ゼノの財宝も、有望な惑星の座標も、その他価値のあるものも何も持たずに戻ってきた。彼らが持ち帰ったのは、食用で驚異的な速度で自己複製する謎のタンパク質の粘液だけだった。この驚異的な物質を購入した者は、培養槽でそれを育てることで、ハイヴ全体を養うことができるだろう。
languages.original_text: A ship has returned from an expedition to the Godless Stars with no xenos treasure, no coordinates of promising worlds, nor anything else of great value. All they have brought back is a mysterious protein-based slime that is edible and replicates itself at a phenomenal rate. Whoever purchases this amazing substance will be able to grow it in cultivation vats to feed entire hives.

traits.locale_text: ある船が神なき星への探検から、ゼノの財宝も、有望な惑星の座標も、その他価値のあるものも何も持たずに戻ってきた。彼らが持ち帰ったのは、食用で驚異的な速度で自己複製する謎のタンパク質の粘液だけだった。この驚異的な物質を購入した者は、培養槽でそれを育てることで、ハイヴ全体を養うことができるだろう。

languages.text: Ein Schiff ist von einer Expedition zu den Gottlosen Sternen ohne Xenoschätze zurückgekehrt, ohne Koordinaten vielversprechender Welten, ohne irgendetwas von größerem Wert. Alles, was sie zurückgebracht haben, ist ein mysteriöser proteinbasierter Schleim, der essbar ist und sich mit phänomenaler Rate fortpflanzt. Wer auch immer diese unglaubliche Substanz kauft, kann sie kultivieren, um ganze Makropolen zu ernähren.
languages.original_text: A ship has returned from an expedition to the Godless Stars with no xenos treasure, no coordinates of promising worlds, nor anything else of great value. All they have brought back is a mysterious protein-based slime that is edible and replicates itself at a phenomenal rate. Whoever purchases this amazing substance will be able to grow it in cultivation vats to feed entire hives.

traits.locale_text: Ein Schiff ist von einer Expedition zu den Gottlosen Sternen ohne Xenoschätze zurückgekehrt, ohne Koordinaten vielversprechender Welten, ohne irgendetwas von größerem Wert. Alles, was sie zurückgebracht haben, ist ein mysteriöser proteinbasierter Schleim, der essbar ist und sich mit phänomenaler Rate fortpflanzt. Wer auch immer diese unglaubliche Substanz kauft, kann sie kultivieren, um ganze Makropolen zu ernähren.

languages.text: İlahsız Yıldızlar'a giden bir gemi; elinde zeno hazinesi, gelecek vaadeden dünyalara dair koordinatlar ya da dişe dokunur değerde başka bir şey olmaksızın geri dönmüş. Getirdikleri tek şey, protein bazlı ve yenebilen esrarengiz bir balçıkmış. Son derece hızlı bir şekilde kendini kopyalayabilen bu tuhaf ve olağanüstü maddeyi her kim alırsa yetiştirme küplerinde çoğaltıp koca kovanları besleyebilecektir.
languages.original_text: A ship has returned from an expedition to the Godless Stars with no xenos treasure, no coordinates of promising worlds, nor anything else of great value. All they have brought back is a mysterious protein-based slime that is edible and replicates itself at a phenomenal rate. Whoever purchases this amazing substance will be able to grow it in cultivation vats to feed entire hives.
